General.Name: Shuangliang Eco-Energy Systems Co Ltd
General.Description: Shuangliang Eco-Energy Systems Co.,Ltd provides energy saving, air cooled condensers, and sea water desalination products primarily in China. The company offers seawater desalination systems; air-cooled condenser systems; lithium bromide absorption heat pump; flue gas fired lithium bromide absorption chiller systems; and hot water, direct and steam fired absorption chiller systems for petrochemical, biochemical, chemical, steel, coal carbonization, metallurgy, thermal power, textile, brewery, food and beverage, palm oil, pulp mill, cooling, heating, power, and solar heating/geothermal industries. It also provides energy management contract; engineering, procurement, and construction; after-sales; and consulting services. Shuangliang Eco-Energy Systems Co.,Ltd was founded in 1982 and is based in Jiangyin, the People's Republic of China.
